alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 8:47AM MDT until further notice by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Julesburg affecting Sedgwick County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Platte River at Julesburg. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.3 feet Tuesday evening. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
